heading: How many MEPs will each EU country get in 2024?
subheading: Distribution of seats in the European Parliament
textNote: The European Parliament's MEP allocation uses degressive proportionality, balancing between larger and smaller EU member states, with a 751 cap
extraInfoText_AT: 1 additional MEPs in comparison to 2019 - 2024 term
